content.question: Which of the following long-term developments in the second half of the 1800s best helps to explain the change in United States culture depicted in the excerpt?

choices.label: Some Americans began to move away from urban areas to form utopian communities.
The formation of farmersâ€™ cooperatives increased resistance to the business practices of corporations.
Some wealthy Americans used the doctrine of Social Darwinism began to justify economic inequality.
The creation of new manufacturing methods allowed factories to greatly increase production.

content.answer: The creation of new manufacturing methods allowed factories to greatly increase production.

skill.text: Skill 5.B: Explain how a historical development or process relates to another historical development or process.
